item.title: Dodian and ..My source
item.dc:creator: @moopoo82 moopoo82
item.description:
@moopoo82 wrote:

Well i wanted to copy some things from dodian but they commands had this:

} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("disabletrade") && (playerRights > 0)) { server.trading = false; yell("Trade disabled"); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("enabletrade") && (playerRights > 0)) { server.trading = true; yell("Trade enabled"); }

Now i dont know what to use instead of server.trading
I replaced yell(“Trade enabled”); with PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has enabled trade.";
but im not sure how to make that command work.
I’m also after an add npc command that works in game.

Read full topic
